document_data.name: ''Bright Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bright shields''''' were [[enchanted]] [[heavy shield]] created to be used by dungeon-delving adventurers some time before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Bright shields'' possessed a simple yet effective ''+1'' enchantment that increased the wielder's protection and illuminated {{SI|15'|'"|long=yes}} around the shield with a yellow light.
document_data.History: ''Bright shields'' were birthed from the eternal dilemma among adventurers: carrying a torch for light or wielding a shield for protection. Over the decades, many magic items were created to satisfy both needs, however, ''bright shields'' were among the more practical items. In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''bright shields'' could be purchased from armor vendors of the [[Market Triangle]] in the city of [[Westgate]].
